definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: What are the reasons to influence the turbot market?
sentences.chinese: 影响大菱鲆市场的原因有哪些？

sentences.english: The cod (fish) can be replaced with trout or turbot.
sentences.chinese: 鳕鱼可以用鲑鱼或者大菱鲆代替。

sentences.english: Prices may however be expected to firm somewhat given weak supply availability.
sentences.chinese: 由于供给有限，养殖大菱鲆价格有望趋于稳定。

sentences.english: Preliminary study on purification and partial characterization of the intestine protease from Scophthalmus maximus L.
sentences.chinese: 大菱鲆肠道蛋白酶的分离纯化及性质的初步研究。

sentences.english: Study on the effect of environment on pigmentation improvement.
sentences.chinese: 研究了环境因子对大菱鲆色素的影响。

sentences.english: The cod (fish) can be replaced with trout or turbot.
sentences.chinese: 鳕鱼可以用鳟鱼或者大菱鲆代替。

definition: turbot/European imported turbot/same as 大菱鮃|大菱鲆
Croceine croaker (Pseudosciaena crocea), a fish popular in Cantonese cooking
grouper (Portuguese: garoupa)/also called 鮨/Epinephelinae (subfamily of Serranidae, fish family including grouper)
Farrer's scallop (Chlamys farreri), aka Chinese scallop
aquatic/produced in sea, rivers or lakes
